subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tag Ridings missed a short par putt on the final hole to fall into a tie with Charles Howell III for the third-round lead at the Turning Stone Resort Championship in Verona, N.Y., the second of seven Fall Series events. Ridings has not won a title in 130 starts on the PGA Tour.
